artist: Engraver: Gaspard Duchange; Delineator: Antoine Boizot
description: bust portrait of French King, facing right in a frame on pedestal
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black [ABoizot excud.   G. Duchange Sculp./ CHEREBERT/ VIII e Roy de France/ Mort au ch\'au de Bloye sur la Garone ex 570. Aprés gnas de regne/ A Paris Chez O;dieuvre, quai d l\'Ecole. Asec Priv. du Roi]; on sheet in pencil [1-365]
title: Cherebert VIII e Roy de France
